content: drops necklace and bracelet in muskat drops extra 0-428 also included in drops 95-23 drops top in cotton viscose and vivaldi 1 length necklace approx 110 cm / 43½ materials drops muskat from garnstudio use a remnant of color no 22 brown color no 49 orange color no 39 pink and color no 41 deep red drops crochet hook size 4 mm/ g/6 7 wooden beads for necklace and small wooden button for bracelet instructions include flower a flower b flower c bobbles items in the set necklace bracelet 2 uk version 3 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=2117&cid=17 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-428-bracelet 3 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3350&cid=19
